snippet.title: Open GPS Tracking System
snippet.description: OpenGTS (Open Source GPS Tracking System) is a full featured web-based GPS tracking system for your fleet of vehicles. It supports OpenLayers and other map providers, detail/summary Reporting, and various GPS tracking devices.

snippet.title: Google Map Gps Cell Phone Tracker
snippet.description: GpsTracker is now in Google Play for android users! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.websmithing.gpstracker Now includes clients for IOS, Android, Windows Phone and Java Me/J2ME cell phones. I have fully updated this project and I hope you will find it useful. Please try it out and rate this application. In short the project allows you to track cell phones periodically. For instance every minute or every five minutes. You can watch the cell phone being tracked in real time and you can store and reload routes easily. You have the choice of two server stacks. Either using asp.net and sql server or using php and mysql. Historically, devs have downloaded the asp.net server project 2 to 1 over the php project. I have included both now in the same download but you only need to use one. If you need help, please go to: http://www.websmithing.com/gps-tracker/ thanks Nick

snippet.title: Traccar (GPS fleet tracking solution)
snippet.description: Open source system for GPS tracking devices

snippet.title: Bluetooth GPS for Android
snippet.description: An application for using an external bluetooth GPS on Android devices

snippet.title: GPS Datalogger Device Control
snippet.description: i-Blue 747 / i-Blue 757 / Qstarz BT-Q1000 / i.Trek Z1 / Konet BGL-32 / Holux M-241 / ... control SW (for Java Phones, PalmOS, WinCe (PPC), Java platforms, Windows, Linux, and MacOS). Compatible with most MTK GPS Chipset based loggers.

snippet.title: Viking GPS data editor and analyzer
snippet.description: Viking is a free/open source program to manage GPS data. You can import, plot and create tracks, routes and waypoints, show OSM, Terraserver, Bing Aerial and other maps, geotag images, see real-time GPS position, get geocaches, control items, etc. It is written in C & the GTK+2 toolkit.

snippet.title: GPS Reviser
snippet.description: Analyze and change GPS coordinates and time in digital pictures

snippet.title: Smartphone IMU GPS
snippet.description: An Android App Dealing with Smartphone Sensors
